function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited access to a large covid-19 dataset for training and testing ai models","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about the potential of blockchain in health systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of autonomous robots in the interconnected iomt infrastructure may lead to bias and breach of privacy in collecting samples from infected patients.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of privacy as infection status is shown to all","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid diagnosis of covid-19 patients lack of quality test","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to spatial covid-19 data for spatial mapping and visualization","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns with contact-tracing apps","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regional integration of electronic health records of suspected covid-19 individuals as they travel from one country to the other","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tracking of home-quarantined individuals using gps and mobile phones","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Malicious attack of iomt healthcare equipment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of personal identification with safety systems could breach privacy and security of health systems.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Remote collection of covid-19 pandemic data using blockchain records could pose privacy risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges of implementing blockchain technology in health systems could lead to security vulnerabilities.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 misinformation causing fear and panic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Generation of noisy data for covid-19","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to detect asymptomatic covid-19 cases in ct images","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent international regulations for covid-19 chest ct image data sharing","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor data quality and sharing in covid-19 chest ct image analysis","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ethical issues and technology vulnerability","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Requirement for change of regulations to track contact-persons","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ethical framework and acceptable use of emerging technologies","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in contact tracing process, including identification, privacy violation, and monitoring.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of physical addresses, street names, and identification cards for contact-persons.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased exposure of contact tracing personnel to covid-19 and potential stigmatization.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Analysis of people’s migration patterns leading to privacy concerns and ethical implications","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misuse of contact tracing data for unethical purposes","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on technology for covid-19 detection and monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of rt-pcr test kits leading to delays in covid-19 diagnosis","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate and unreliable ai forecasting models due to noisy and limited data","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Search string focusing on contagious diseases could lead to biased results and miss important studies related to other diseases or areas of research.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of nonpeer-reviewed articles and studies in other languages with no english translation might lead to language and publication bias.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on ai algorithms for quality assessment may overlook important nuances and context in the evaluation of research articles.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High-risk patients identification","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 hotspot mapping","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate real-time case surveillance","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of covid-19 testing kits and detection tools","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quarantine-induced reduction in physical activity energy expenditure","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mental health impacts of lack of access to exercise and physical activity","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlation between physical activity and psychological well-being","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Worsening of psychophysical conditions due to pandemic-induced restrictions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gender disparity in the correlation between physical activity reduction and psychological well-being","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased physical activity energy expenditure during quarantine","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased physical activity levels during the pandemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low physical activity levels among italian adults, especially during covid-19 quarantine","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in performing intense exercise at home compared to moderate activity","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges of maintaining physical activity levels during quarantine","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Worldwide spread of sars-cov-2 leading to containment measures and quarantine","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited sample size for the study","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Absence of national health monitoring and surveillance system for physical activity in italy","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction of physical activity linked with worse psychological well-being during covid-19.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
